mapper.insert: insert into orders (orderNumber, orderDate, requiredDate, shippedDate, status, customerNumber, comments) values (#{ordernumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{requireddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{shippeddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customernumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comments,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update orders set orderDate = #{orderdate,jdbcType=DATE}, requiredDate = #{requireddate,jdbcType=DATE}, shippedDate = #{shippeddate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerNumber = #{customernumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where orderNumber = #{ordernumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select orderNumber, orderDate, requiredDate, shippedDate, status, customerNumber, comments from orders where orderNumber = #{ordernumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select orderNumber, orderDate, requiredDate, shippedDate, status, customerNumber, comments from orders
